se.swedenconnect.security.credential.spring.converters.AbstractResourcePropertyConverter

Packages that use AbstractResourcePropertyConverter
Package
Description
se.swedenconnect.security.credential.spring.converters
Spring converters that are usable when working with credentials.

  • Uses of AbstractResourcePropertyConverter in se.swedenconnect.security.credential.spring.converters

    Subclasses of AbstractResourcePropertyConverter in se.swedenconnect.security.credential.spring.converters
    Modifier and Type
    Class
    Description
    class 
    PropertyToPrivateKeyConverter
    A Converter that gets the property value (e.g., classpath:signing.key) and instantiates a PrivateKey object.
    class 
    PropertyToPublicKeyConverter
    A Converter that gets the property value (e.g., classpath:trust.key) and instantiates a PublicKey object.
    class 
    PropertyToX509CertificateConverter
    A Converter that gets the property value (e.g., classpath:cert.crt) and instantiates an X509Certificate object.
